Original_Text: HOUSTON (Reuters) - NASA's Perseverance rover detected organic molecules in a Martian crater, fueling speculation about past microbial life in space, scientists announced on Tuesday.
SAN FRANCISCO - A new internet security protocol developed by Cloudflare aims to reduce latency and enhance user privacy, the company revealed at a tech conference.
PARIS (AFP) - The European Space Agency's Gaia mission mapped over 1 billion stars, providing astronomers with precise data to attribute galactic movements.
TOKYO - Sony unveiled a next-generation internet-connected wearable device that integrates augmented reality with real-time data processing.
PASADENA, Calif. - NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory confirmed that the Voyager 2 spacecraft, now in interstellar space, continues to send data back to Earth.
LONDON (Reuters) - A quantum computing breakthrough allows researchers to attribute complex calculations to specific qubits, advancing internet encryption methods.
CAPE CANAVERAL - SpaceX launched a new satellite to improve global internet connectivity, targeting underserved regions with high-speed access.
BERLIN - A German startup introduced an internet-based platform for real-time collaboration on space mission simulations, attracting ESA funding.
MOSCOW (TASS) - Russia's Roscosmos agency plans to deploy a new space telescope to study exoplanets, with a launch scheduled for 2027.
SINGAPORE - Researchers developed an AI algorithm to attribute cyberattack origins on the internet, enhancing global cybersecurity efforts.
